response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This unique offering is designed to elevate your business to new heights and streamline your operations. With its advanced features and unparalleled capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it brings, I'm offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This investment is expected to pay off significantly in terms of efficiency gains and cost savings over time. I believe this is an excellent opportunity for you to enhance your company's performance. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about how this product can specifically benefit your business.", "product_price": 18000}
